New Records: Dallas Mavericks set a new record by holding the Los Angeles Lakers below 100 points
Key Match Events: Dallas Mavericks held LeBron James and Anthony Davis to low shooting percentages
Quentin Grimes scored 23 points, nine rebounds, and six assists
Post-Match Reflections: Spencer Dinwiddie mentioned their goal was to hold the Lakers below 100 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mavericks were shorthanded without Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving
The win was a much-needed boost for the Mavericks
